Hi, I'm Ari. Among other things:

  • I am a student in the Residential College of the University of Michigan!

  • I probably will find some way to relate my studies in college to computers. For more on that, see here to see my first webpage ever, a tutorial on HTML, or here for more on CS.
  • I love:
    1. bar trivia/Quiz Bowl/whatever you kids call it these days. My greatest last-minute cramming tool is Wikipedia.
    2. I am an avid runner, who is just starting out (as of six months ago). My shoes currently look like this. If you have any tips, good routes in A2 or HP, drop me a line.
    3. I procrastinate professionally. We can have coffee someday, if you'd like.
    4. I love the outdoors (see above) and hiking.
    5. Any and all of the following: 3D modelling/printing/design/LEGO.
